● HSK 4 Vocabulary

\'Chinese Helper\' is a Chinese learning app with an easy and effective way for beginners. \'Chinese Helper\' app provides almost HSK 4 vocabulary including 20 different categories for practicing Chinese regularly. Every feature of the app has been designed in a very simple way to make the \'Chinese Helper\' app very effective for beginner Chinese learners. Also, the phrasebook that is used in daily life is arranged in each category in this app very neatly, which will motivate and make it easier for our users to learn Chinese.

The Chinese language is one of the oldest languages in the world, spoken by more than 1.2 billion people, and one of the most powerful and challenging languages in the world. The official language of China is Mandarin, which is the very name of \'Hanyu\' or \'Putonghua\', belonging to Sino-Tibetan. Chinese Mandarin is a tonal language which means pronouncing the same word with different tones, it can change the whole meaning of your sentence. In an attempt to make the Chinese language more understandable to the western world, China developed the pinyin system. The pinyin system uses the western alphabet and spelling to pronounce Chinese words. \n\nTo learn about details Chinese Mandarin, here is some important resources link:

Hello Everyone, This is MD Sazibur Rahman Papel (王磊), I'm a student of Computer Science and Technology at Ankang University in Shaanxi Province, China. Also Editor of Brahmanbaria Tribune and Author of Article for People and founder of Our Brahmanbaria App.

I have been living in China for almost two years and that's why I got the opportunity to learn the Chinese language. and Undoubtedly, Chinese language is one of the oldest languages in the world, spoken by more than 1.2 billion people, and it is one of the most powerful and challenging languages in the world.

Therefore, Personally I have taken the initiative to create this app to show the inner beauty of this language and make it easier and smooth for every Chinese learner. 

Happy Chinese Learning!
